title: Acupuncture | Reiki | Massage | Green Mountain Holistic Healing | Morristown VT
description: Green Mountain Holistic Healing offers several different types of healing modalities including acupuncture, massage, reiki, and access consciousness services in Morristown, Vermont.
cleaned_text: top of page About Our Principles Holistic medicine is based on the belief that unconditional love and support is the most powerful healer. At Green Mountain Holistic Healing, we provide personalized treatments focusing on the health and overall wellbeing of each individual. Whether you choose acupuncture, massage or Reiki, energy work aims to help the flow of energy and remove blocks. We believe that improving the flow of energy around the body can enable relaxation, relieve pain, speed in the healing process, and reduce other symptoms of illness. Our Services bottom of page
